Eco-friendly Printer Rentals: A Greener Choice for Modern Offices

In a world increasingly focused on sustainability, businesses are reevaluating every aspect of their operations—including their office equipment. One area often overlooked is printing. While necessary for many workflows, traditional printing methods can significantly harm the environment. That’s where eco-friendly printer rentals come in.

By renting energy-efficient, environmentally responsible printers, companies not only reduce their carbon footprint but also cut costs and streamline operations. In this blog, we’ll explore why eco-friendly printer rentals are a smart move, what features to look for, and how Marga Enterprises can help you make a greener switch.

Why Eco-friendly Printer Rentals Matter

Eco-friendly printer rentals contribute to environmental sustainability in several meaningful ways:

  • Lower Energy Consumption
    Most green printers are ENERGY STAR® certified, using significantly less electricity during operation and standby.

  • Reduced E-waste
    Renting helps reduce the number of outdated machines ending up in landfills. Instead of discarding machines, they’re refurbished or repurposed by rental companies like Marga Enterprises.

  • Efficient Use of Consumables
    Eco-friendly printers are designed to minimize ink and toner waste. Duplex printing, toner-saving modes, and refillable cartridges are just a few features that support waste reduction.

  • Better Maintenance, Less Waste
    When you rent from a responsible provider, regular maintenance keeps the machine working efficiently, extending its life and performance.

Features of Eco-Friendly Printers

When choosing eco-friendly printer rentals, it’s important to know what features make a printer "green." Here are a few to look for:

1. ENERGY STAR® Certification

Printers with this label meet strict energy efficiency guidelines. They use less power in both standby and active modes.

2. Duplex Printing

Automatic double-sided printing reduces paper usage by up to 50%.

3. Recyclable or Refillable Cartridges

Some printers use ink systems that support refilling instead of replacing—less plastic, less cost.

4. EPEAT Rating

The Electronic Product Environmental Assessment Tool (EPEAT) evaluates printers based on environmental criteria like design, energy use, and packaging.

5. Sleep and Power Management Features

Smart power-off functions save energy when the printer is idle.

Business Benefits of Going Green

Transitioning to eco-friendly printer rentals doesn’t just benefit the planet—it also helps your business.

  • Cost Savings
    Efficient machines use less energy and supplies, cutting down operational expenses.

  • Regulatory Compliance
    Companies are now expected to follow environmental standards. Choosing sustainable equipment can support your ESG (Environmental, Social, Governance) initiatives.

  • Positive Brand Image
    Demonstrating commitment to sustainability improves your public reputation with clients, partners, and even employees.

  • Scalability and Flexibility
    Eco-friendly rental plans allow you to scale up or down as your business needs change—without locking you into long-term hardware ownership.

How to Choose the Right Eco-Friendly Rental Plan

Looking to make the switch? Here's how to get started:

1. Evaluate Your Printing Needs

Assess your average print volume, color vs. black-and-white requirements, and any special functions (scanning, faxing, mobile printing).

2. Choose a Trusted Rental Provider

Look for companies that specialize in eco-friendly printer rentals, offer transparent agreements, and include service/maintenance in the package.

We recommend starting with this cost comparison guide on renting vs. buying to understand long-term benefits.

3. Ask About the Green Features

Don’t hesitate to ask for specifics:

  • Is the printer ENERGY STAR® certified?

  • Do you offer models with refillable cartridges?

  • How is waste managed at the end of the contract?

4. Review Maintenance Terms

Ensure that the rental package includes preventive maintenance, updates, and part replacements to maximize machine life and efficiency.

The Role of Marga Enterprises in Green Printing

  • Energy-efficient printer models

  • Flexible contract terms suited for startups, SMEs, and large-scale offices

  • Professional maintenance support for optimal performance and longer equipment life

  • Transparent billing—no hidden charges

Case Example: Greener Printing for Events and Offices

One of our clients, an events company based in Metro Manila, reduced their print-related carbon output by switching to eco-friendly printer rentals. With duplex-enabled machines and ENERGY STAR®-certified units, they managed to cut paper use by 40% and energy consumption by 35%—all while saving money through a short-term rental package.

Another customer, a law firm, upgraded to eco-friendly multifunction printers that include automated toner-saving features and remote monitoring. They now maintain a more sustainable office and report fewer technical issues—thanks to our regular service maintenance.

Conclusion: Go Green with Marga Enterprises

Switching to eco-friendly printer rentals is one small step that can make a big impact—on both the environment and your bottom line. Whether you’re a growing business or a large enterprise, sustainable printing solutions are within reach.

Partner with a rental provider that shares your values. Choose Marga Enterprises. Let’s print smarter, cleaner, and greener—together.
